content: {"locationId": "1768", "organizationId": "1604", "name": "Trinity Church", "address1": "3515 Shackelford", "address2": "", "city": "Florrisant", "state": "MO", "zipCode": "63031", "country": null, "phone": "314-838-8820", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "38.8384529", "longitude": "-90.3265709", "foodPrograms": "Community Mobile Market", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "In partnership with the St. Louis Area Foodbank, Trinity Church is hosting a once a month drive-through Community Mobile Market. Neighbors have the opportunity to get a mix of fresh and nonperishable food items at no cost. The distribution will end at the stated time or once all of the food and other resources have been distributed.  This event is set up as a drive through distribution and volunteers and/or staff of the organization will put food directly into your car. We ask that you have space in your vehicle for the food items and that you not leave your vehicle during the distribution. Please arrive at least 15 minutes prior to the start of the event. We do not require any identification or verification of income \u2013 anyone is welcome. *Dates and times are subject to change. We recommend checking in with the partner organization prior to the event to confirm dates/times.", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "314-838-8820", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 17, "regionName": "St. Louis Area Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "2663eb40-ca6e-413e-8ab2-bf60bbdd2771.jpg", "website": "https://stlfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": [], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
